Package org.dark.shaders.light

Interface LightAPI

All Known Implementing Classes:
StandardLight
public interface LightAPI
An interface for managing lights in the lighting engine.

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description
    boolean
    advance(float amount)
    Runs once per frame.

  • Method Details

    • getLocation

      org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector2f getLocation()
      Gets the current location of the light.

      Returns:
      The current location of the light.

    • getLocation2

      org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector2f getLocation2()
      Gets the current location of the light's secondary endpoint. Only used for line-type lights.

      Returns:
      The current location of the light's secondary endpoint.

    • getArcStart

      float getArcStart()
      The start of the current visible arc of the light, in degrees. Only used for cone-type lights.

      Returns:
      The start of the current visible arc of the light, in degrees.

      Since:
      Alpha 1.4

    • getArcEnd

      float getArcEnd()
      The end of the current visible arc of the light, in degrees. Only used for cone-type lights.

      Returns:
      The current facing direction of the light.

      Since:
      Alpha 1.4

    • getDirection

      org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f getDirection()
      Gets the light's directional vector. Only used for directional-type lights.

      Returns:
      The light's directional vector.

      Since:
      Alpha 1.4

    • getSpecularIntensity

      float getSpecularIntensity()
      Gets the specular intensity of the light. Only used for directional-type lights.

      Returns:
      The specular intensity of the light.

      Since:
      Alpha 1.4

    • getSpecularMult

      float getSpecularMult()
      Gets the specular multiplier of the light. Only used for point-type lights.

      Returns:
      The specular multiplier of the light.

      Since:
      1.4.0

    • getHeight

      float getHeight()
      Gets the height of the light, in world-space units. Only used for the purposes of normal maps.

      Returns:
      The world-space height of the light.

      Since:
      Alpha 1.4

    • getColor

      org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f getColor()
      Gets the light's color.

      Returns:
      An object whose xyz components correspond to rgb, in terms of values between 0.0 and 1.0.

    • getSize

      float getSize()
      Gets the light's size.

      Returns:
      The light's size, in units.

    • getIntensity

      float getIntensity()
      Gets the light's intensity.

      Returns:
      The light's intensity, in terms of lumens at the center of the light.

    • getType

      int getType()
      Gets the light's type.

      Returns:
      The light's current type. Type 0: point light (default). Type 1: line light. Type 2: cone light. Type 3: directional light.

    • advance

      boolean advance(float amount)
      Runs once per frame.

      Parameters:
      amount - Seconds since last frame.

      Returns:
      True if the light should be destroyed this frame, false if it should not be destroyed this frame.

      Since:
      Alpha 1.2
